author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Third Republican Debate October 28, 2015 Yes Trump, Carson and Cruz Will Be on Stage | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News) CNBC CAPITULATED AND CHANGED THE FORMAT Save the Date: October 28, 2015 The republican debate will be held as scheduled in Boulder, Colorado, YES Donald Trump and Ben Carson will be on stage. CNBC has agreed to alter the anticipated rules for the upcoming GOP presidential after several candidates complaimed. With Trump leading the charge. Debate will now be capped at two hours including commercials and will feature 30 second closing statements, according to CNBC. Trump and Carson on Thursday wrote CNBC a letter Thursday insisting on the new rules. Those demands were in part fueled by the toll drawn-out debates have taken on several candidates. “To be clear, neither of our campaigns agreed to the length you propose or your ban on opening or closing statements. In fact, neither of our campaigns were even consulted,” the two candidates said the letter. “Neither of those conditions are acceptable.”
Trump didn’t stop at writing a letter — he also took to social media on several occasions to blast out attacks to his 4.6 million Twitter followers.
